headline: ON Semiconductor (NasdaqGS:ON) Posts 30% Price Surge Over Last Month Despite Q1 2025 Net Loss
summary: ON Semiconductor (NasdaqGS:ON) has been actively engaging in a share buyback program, with a significant tranche completed that may have bolstered investor confidence. Despite reporting a net loss for the first quarter of 2025, alongside reduced sales figures, the company's stock price increased by 30% over the last month. This sharp rise contrasts the broader market's more modest 4% uptick, suggesting that ON's ongoing share repurchases, despite negative earnings news, may have contributed...
